availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. McCready (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Kentucky native. Married Rebecca McCready. Father of John M. McCready, Virginia P. McCready, Samantha McCready, and Edmonia McCready. Farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Merchant in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 240; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 44; Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), Ancestry.com, Kentucky, Louisville, Deaths, April 2, 1885, p. 129; KYR-0001-029-0500.
